documentation.text: @dev Sets the batch status to InTransit and assigns a transporter.
@dev Sets the batch status to Received.
@dev Sets the batch status to Destroyed.
@dev Returns the current state details of the batch.

devdoc.details: Data container for raw materials. State managed strictly by SupplyChainLogic.      Uses standard naming conventions internally; public interface preserved.

getDetails().details: Returns the current state details of the batch.

setDestroyed(bytes32).details: Sets the batch status to Destroyed.

setInTransit(address).details: Sets the batch status to InTransit and assigns a transporter.

setReceived().details: Sets the batch status to Received.

devdoc.title: RawMaterial (Batch Contract)
